channel.title: Comments on: Spurgeon on crying children in the church service

item.title: By: bryan
item.dc:creator: bryan
item.description: Well...I am pondering how many "crying" adults there are as they consider whats taking so long...maybe we should as them to cry out loud, then shoot them and carry them out!....babies are more joyful to me than the inevitible scoul on the face of a crying adult!!
item.content:encoded: Well…I am pondering how many “crying” adults there are as they consider whats taking so long…maybe we should as them to cry out loud, then shoot them and carry them out!….babies are more joyful to me than the inevitible scoul on the face of a crying adult!!
